thread.section_title: RapidAdvance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RapidAdvance | www.rapidadvance.com
thread.title: Stephanie Christou

author: Stephanie Christou
title: Stephanie Christou
text: I've been working with RapidAdvance for funding for several years now. At first I was hesitant, but it's actually been a smooth and easy few years. My rep Nick has really gone to bat to get me the funding I need at a payback I can afford. Thanks for being an excellent company, which is rare to find these days! I highly recommend them for anyone needing unconventional funding.
